snippet.title: 8 Bit Adventures 2 PC Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
8-Bit Adventures 2 officially releases on PC (Steam and GOG) on January 31st, 2023 – with PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch versions coming later that same year. 

8-Bit Adventures 2 is everything you love about classic JRPGs - with all of the charm, heart and soul, but none of the inconvenience.

That means you can experience an earnest, engaging storyline; relatable, easy-to-love characters; strategic turn-based battles; deep party customisation; bizarre monsters; an unforgettable soundtrack; and a large, fantastical world, traversed by Airship, and brought to life by vibrant 8-Bit inspired visuals. It may be a sequel, but anyone can jump into this brand new JRPG adventure!

Official Website: https://www.8bitadventures2.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalGamesAU 
Discord: https://discord.gg/aKf2tr4
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/733110/8Bit_Adventures_2/

Designed and Developed by: Josh Hallaran 
Pixel Art & Visual Design by: Jerram Fahey (NoeL) 
Soundtrack Composed by: Sebastian Cruz (Carfonu) 
Battle & UI Programming by: M. Sufyan Noor (DrDhoom)
Promotional Artwork by: Ryan Jampole
